Class League

  • java.lang.Object
    • League

  • public class League
extends java.lang.Object
    Assignment 4, Fall 2014: Worker Class (League) Determines the records, winners, losses and ties of six soccer teams The values 2d array is based on the file that is read in on through the driver class. Values for the records, winners, losses and ties are computated using incremented loops
    Author:
    Ebony Cross

      • League

        League(int w,
       int l,
       int t,
       java.lang.String[] teamName,
       int[][] p)
        contructor initializes win, lose, tie to values from the parameter and copies arrays to the corresponding array in the parameter
        Parameters:
        w - the numbers of wins for a particular team
        l - the numbers of losses for a particular team
        t - the numbers of ties for a particular team
        teamName - the names in the soccer league
        p - the score of points for each team in each game
